change_password: Go to Account → Change Password to update your password.
reset_password: Go to Settings → Account → Reset Password.
two_factor_issues: Go to Security → Two-Factor → Reset and follow on-screen steps.
account_locked: Your account is locked for security reasons. Contact support to unlock.
suspicious_activity: If you noticed unusual activity, please reset password immediately.
update_profile: Go to Profile → Edit Info to update your information.
change_email: Go to Account → Edit Email → Verify new email.
change_phone: Go to Account → Edit Phone Number.
delete_account: Contact support to permanently delete your account.
profile_picture: Go to Profile → Edit → Upload Picture.
track_order: Go to Orders → Track Order to see your shipment status.
cancel_order: Orders can be cancelled within 24 hours of placement.
delivery_delay: Your order may be delayed due to logistics issues.
wrong_item: If you received the wrong item, open a support ticket immediately.
missing_item: If an item is missing, contact support with order details.
refund_policy: Refunds are processed within 3–5 business days.
refund_rejected: Refund may be rejected due to item condition or policy violation.
return_pickup: Return pickups are scheduled within 48 hours.
track_refund: Refund status is available in Orders → Refunds.
exchange_item: Exchanges are available for select items only.
payment_failed: Please check your card details or try again later.
double_charge: If double charged, refund will be auto-processed in 3–5 days.
update_payment_method: Go to Payment Settings to update your payment method.
invoice_request: Invoices are available in Orders → Invoice.
accepted_payment_methods: We accept Debit/Credit cards, UPI, Wallets, and PayPal.
plan_details: Visit Account → Subscription for plan details.
upgrade_plan: Click Upgrade on your Subscription page.
auto_renew: Auto-renew can be disabled in Subscription settings.
trial_rules: Trial periods last 7 days unless otherwise stated.
app_crashing: Restart the app. If problem persists, reinstall.
app_slow: Clear app cache and try again.
mic_not_working: Grant microphone access in browser or device settings.
website_not_loading: Clear cache or try again on different browser.
wallet_transfer: Wallet balance cannot be transferred to bank.
customs_fees: International orders may include customs charges.
weekend_delivery: Weekend delivery available in select cities.
change_shipping_speed: You can modify shipping speed before dispatch.
api_rate_limit: Rate limit reached. Try again after cooldown.
webhook_issue: Ensure your webhook endpoint returns HTTP 200.
sandbox_vs_live: Use sandbox keys for testing and live keys for production.
api_key_generation: Generate keys under Developer → API Keys.
kyc_rejected: KYC may be rejected due to unclear documents or mismatch.
blood_test_fasting_time: For fasting blood tests, it is recommended to visit the lab in the morning after fasting for 8 to 12 hours. Plain water is allowed unless advised otherwise.
water_during_fasting: Yes, you can drink plain water during fasting unless your doctor advises otherwise.
coffee_before_blood_test: Coffee, tea, milk, and sugary drinks should be avoided during fasting as they may affect test results.
medicine_before_blood_test: You should continue regular medicines unless your doctor specifically asks you to stop them before the test.
smoking_before_blood_test: Smoking before a blood test is not recommended as it may affect certain results.
blood_test_morning_time: Fasting blood tests are usually done in the morning to ensure accurate results after overnight fasting.
blood_test_without_fasting: Some blood tests do not require fasting. The lab will inform you if fasting is needed for your test.
water_before_blood_test: Drinking plain water before a blood test is generally allowed and helps prevent dehydration.
exercise_before_blood_test: Heavy exercise should be avoided before a blood test as it may affect test results.
blood_sample_safety: Blood sample collection is safe and performed using sterile equipment.
bruise_after_blood_test: Mild bruising at the needle site may occur and usually heals on its own.
weakness_after_blood_test: Feeling slightly weak after a blood test is common and improves with rest.
blood_report_availability: Blood test reports are usually ready within 24 hours. You will receive the report once it is generated.
blood_report_download_process: You can download your blood test report from the app or website once it is ready.
blood_report_abnormal: Lab reports may show abnormal values. A doctor can help interpret what they mean.
cbc_blood_test: A complete blood count test helps evaluate overall health and detect infections or anemia.
sugar_fasting_test: Fasting blood sugar tests measure glucose levels after fasting for accurate results.
hba1c_blood_test: HbA1c tests show average blood sugar levels over the past three months and do not require fasting.
thyroid_blood_test: Thyroid blood tests measure hormone levels and usually do not require fasting.
cholesterol_blood_test: Cholesterol blood tests often require fasting for 9 to 12 hours.
dengue_blood_test: Dengue blood tests help detect dengue infection and are done using a blood sample.
malaria_blood_test: Malaria blood tests identify parasites in the blood for early diagnosis.
crp_blood_test: CRP blood tests detect inflammation or infection in the body.
esr_blood_test: ESR blood tests measure inflammation and are often done with other blood tests.
home_blood_collection: Home blood sample collection allows tests to be done at your home at a scheduled time.
home_collection_technician: A trained technician visits your home with sterile equipment for sample collection.
home_collection_reschedule: Home blood sample collection can be rescheduled before the appointment time.
home_collection_charge: Home sample collection may include an additional service charge.
blood_test_during_fever: Blood tests can be done during fever to help identify the cause of illness.
blood_test_pregnancy_safe: Blood tests are generally safe during pregnancy when advised by a doctor.
blood_test_elderly_safe: Blood tests are safe for elderly patients with proper care.
blood_test_after_vaccination: Some blood tests may be affected after vaccination, so timing should be confirmed with a doctor.
blood_sample_collection_time: Blood sample collection usually takes about 5 to 10 minutes, including preparation.
blood_test_report_delay_reason: Blood test reports may be delayed due to complex testing, quality checks, or high sample volume at the lab.
blood_amount_taken: For blood tests, only a small amount of blood is collected, usually a few milliliters. This is safe and does not affect health.
lab_opening_time: Most diagnostic labs open in the early morning, commonly between 6:00 AM and 8:00 AM. Opening hours may vary by branch.
lab_closing_time: Labs generally close in the evening, usually between 6:00 PM and 9:00 PM depending on location.
appointment_needed_for_test: Booking an appointment helps reduce waiting time, but many labs also accept walk-in patients.
walk_in_test_available: Walk-in blood tests are available at most labs without prior appointment.
lab_waiting_duration: Average waiting time at labs is around 10 to 30 minutes based on crowd and test type.
id_required_for_lab: Some labs may ask for a valid ID or prescription during patient registration.
prescription_mandatory: Prescription is required for certain medical tests, while routine tests may not need one.
sample_labeling_process: Each sample is labeled immediately with patient details to ensure correct identification.
sample_mixup_prevention: Labs follow strict verification and labeling protocols to prevent sample mix-ups.
lab_test_accuracy_check: All lab tests are performed using calibrated machines and validated procedures.
blood_collection_pain: Blood sample collection usually causes minimal pain, similar to a small needle prick.
blood_collection_position: Blood samples are collected while the patient is seated or lying down comfortably.
blood_collection_multiple_tests: Multiple blood tests can usually be performed using a single blood sample.
blood_collection_repeat: A repeat blood sample may be needed if the initial sample is insufficient or compromised.
blood_collection_children: Special care and gentle techniques are used when collecting blood from children.
blood_collection_elderly: Extra care is taken during blood collection for elderly patients to ensure comfort and safety.
fear_of_needles: Trained technicians help calm patients who are afraid of needles during blood collection.
minor_bleeding_after_test: Minor bleeding after blood collection is normal and usually stops within a few minutes.
bandage_after_blood_test: A small bandage is applied to protect the needle site after blood collection.
infection_risk_blood_test: There is no infection risk when blood is collected using sterile, single-use equipment.
alcohol_before_blood_test: Alcohol should be avoided before blood tests as it may affect test results.
smoking_before_test: Smoking before a blood test can influence certain lab values and should be avoided.
sleep_before_test: Getting proper sleep before a blood test helps maintain accurate results.
stress_effect_on_tests: High stress levels can temporarily alter some blood test readings.
hydration_before_test: Drinking enough water before a blood test helps veins become more visible.
vitamins_before_test: Some vitamin supplements may affect lab results, so inform the lab in advance.
herbal_medicine_test_effect: Herbal medicines can interfere with certain blood test results.
heavy_meal_before_test: Eating a heavy meal before some blood tests may impact accuracy.
report_ready_notification: You will usually receive a notification when your blood test report is ready.
report_email_option: Blood test reports can be sent to your registered email address.
report_language_available: Most lab reports are provided in English for easy understanding.
normal_range_in_report: Normal reference ranges are shown next to test values in the report.
report_verification_details: Lab reports include verification details to confirm authenticity.
doctor_consultation_report: A doctor can help explain blood test results and their significance.
partial_report_release: Some test reports may be released in parts if different tests take different times.
online_report_access: Blood test reports can be accessed online once they are published.
printed_report_copy: Printed copies of lab reports can be collected from the lab if required.
blood_test_for_fatigue: Blood tests help identify causes of fatigue such as anemia or vitamin deficiency.
blood_test_for_weight_loss: Blood tests may help determine reasons for unexplained weight loss.
blood_test_for_infection: Blood tests are used to detect infections in the body.
blood_test_for_heart_health: Certain blood tests help assess heart health and risk factors.
blood_test_for_liver: Liver function blood tests check how well the liver is working.
blood_test_for_kidney: Kidney blood tests measure how efficiently the kidneys filter waste.
blood_test_for_vitamins: Vitamin blood tests help identify nutritional deficiencies.
blood_test_for_hormones: Hormone blood tests evaluate endocrine system balance.
blood_test_for_immunity: Some blood tests assess immune system strength and response.
blood_test_for_allergy: Allergy blood tests help identify substances causing allergic reactions.
blood_test_for_thyroid: Thyroid blood tests help diagnose hormone imbalance issues.
blood_test_cost: Blood test prices vary depending on the type of test. Exact charges can be viewed before booking the test.
full_body_checkup_package: Full body checkup packages are available and include multiple tests at a discounted price.
lab_test_insurance_coverage: Some lab tests may be covered by insurance depending on your policy. Please check with your insurance provider.
test_cancellation_refund: If a test is cancelled, the refund will be processed as per the lab’s cancellation policy.
refund_processing_time: Refunds are usually processed within a few business days after cancellation.
payment_methods_lab: Lab test payments can be made using cards, UPI, wallets, or other supported payment methods.
advance_payment_required: Some lab tests may require advance payment before sample collection.
discounts_on_tests: Discounts may be available on selected tests or health packages.
price_variation_reason: Test prices may vary based on test complexity, equipment used, and location.
menstrual_cycle_blood_test: Some blood tests may be affected during menstruation. It is best to inform the lab before testing.
fasting_mistake_before_test: If fasting instructions were not followed, the test may need to be rescheduled for accurate results.
water_intake_limit: Only plain water should be consumed before fasting tests unless instructed otherwise.
recent_illness_effect: Recent illness can affect some blood test values. Inform the lab if you were recently unwell.
antibiotics_before_test: Certain antibiotics may influence test results. Always inform the lab about current medications.
dizziness_after_blood_test: Some people may feel dizzy after blood collection. Sitting and resting for a few minutes usually helps.
fainting_risk_blood_test: Fainting is rare but can occur. Inform the technician if you have fainted during blood tests before.
post_test_food: You can resume normal eating immediately after a blood test unless advised otherwise.
arm_pain_after_test: Mild arm pain after blood collection is normal and usually resolves within a day.
driving_after_blood_test: Most people can safely drive after a blood test if they feel normal.
slightly_abnormal_report: Slightly abnormal values do not always indicate a serious condition and should be reviewed by a doctor.
compare_old_reports: Doctors often compare current reports with previous ones to assess health trends.
lab_reference_range_difference: Normal ranges may vary slightly between labs due to different testing methods.
report_units_confusion: Lab reports use medical units that may seem complex. A doctor can help explain them clearly.
self_diagnosis_warning: Lab reports should not be used for self-diagnosis without medical guidance.
home_collection_availability_area: Home collection availability depends on your location and service coverage.
home_collection_time_slot: Home sample collection can be scheduled for a preferred time slot.
home_collection_hygiene: Technicians follow strict hygiene and safety protocols during home sample collection.
home_collection_identity: Technicians carry identification for verification during home visits.
home_collection_multiple_people: Samples for multiple family members can be collected in a single home visit.
repeat_test_requirement: Repeat testing may be required to confirm abnormal or borderline results.
seasonal_effect_on_tests: Certain test values may vary slightly based on season or hydration levels.
pregnancy_false_results: Pregnancy can influence some blood test results.
age_related_test_changes: Normal test ranges may differ based on age and gender.
test_accuracy_percentage: Lab tests are highly accurate when conducted under proper conditions.
reschedule_test: Test appointments can usually be rescheduled before sample collection.
missed_appointment: If an appointment is missed, rebooking may be required.
bulk_test_booking: Multiple tests can be booked together in a single order.
family_test_booking: Health tests can be booked for multiple family members at once.
test_booking_confirmation: Booking confirmation details are shared after successful scheduling.
emergency_test_support: Lab services are not a replacement for emergency medical care.
critical_value_alert: Critical test values may be flagged and require immediate medical attention.
lab_vs_hospital_test: Some specialized tests may require hospital-based facilities.
false_positive_test: False positives can occur and usually require confirmatory testing.
false_negative_test: False negatives are possible if testing is done too early or incorrectly.
